de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.elements

Class MenuContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.elements.MenuBaseElement
      • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.elements.MenuContainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuPanel

    public class MenuContainer
extends MenuBaseElement
    A container containing multiple other elements (but has no visual style)
